title: MD
biography: Genelia Deshmukh, also credited professionally as Genelia, is an Indian actress who predominantly appears in Telugu, Hindi, and Tamil films. Described in the media as one of the leading South Indian actresses of the 2000s, D'Souza is a recipient of several accolades including a Filmfare Award South and two Nandi Awards.
aiSummary: D. B. P. D'Souza is a valve surgery specialist with an H-index of 4 at Cardiac Surgery (Member). Has been published in Nature, Investigative ophthalmology & visual science, medRxiv : the preprint server for health sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
